title: Android 13 DP2: Google unites text and display size sliders on one page
content:
The ability to adjust your display and text size in Android is crucial. Now, it’s even easier to do so in Android 13 Developer Preview 2, where both of these sliders are combined into one settings page.

more…

The post Android 13 DP2: Google unites text and display size sliders on one page appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: In Android 13, you can now change your display and text size on the same page instead of separate settings pages such as on Android 12.
